name: Kingler
flavorText:
The large pincer
has 10000 hp of
crushing power. However, its huge
size makes it
unwieldy to use.

previous.name: Krabby
previous.flavorText:
Its pincers are
not only powerful
weapons, they are used for balance
when walking
sideways.

next.name: Voltorb
next.flavorText:
Usually found in
power plants.
Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL,
they have zapped
many people.
